desc.descText: Award and upgrade - Upgrade with Avios

Checked Baggage - Weight concept routes: 35kg
Piece concept routes: 2 pieces, 23kg each
Refund Fees - Refund to original form of payment (no charge)
Change Fees - Permitted at no charge, provided that changes are made at least  3 hours prior to departure

Purchase Conditions - Remember to check your immigration and health requirements before you travel and ensure you carry the required travel documents. Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the on-board product or service maybe different to that described.
Combination of Fares - When a ticket is booked with a combination of fares, the most restrictive cancellation rule will apply.

Seat selection - Standard Seat :Standard seat selection
Preferred Seat :Prefered seat selection
